content: And now with Cmd and build.security and, obviously, internal innovations that we are doing within the company all the time, I think that we are well positioned from a product perspective to really support what the XDR market is really trying to solve, which is trying to create a place where you can store all data possible and threat hunt extremely fast, either manually or through AI and machine learning algorithms, and then extend to the peripherals so you can prevent and – detect and prevent things there like endpoints and container and cloud-native workloads.
